thread.title: This Stiles And Lydia Make-Out Scene From 'Teen Wolf' Will Make You Feel Things
thread.title_full: This Stiles And Lydia Make-Out Scene From 'Teen Wolf' Will Make You Feel Things

author: Minou Clark
title: This Stiles And Lydia Make-Out Scene From 'Teen Wolf' Will Make You Feel Things
text:
This Stiles And Lydia Make-Out Scene From 'Teen Wolf' Will Make You Feel Things SO. STEAMY. 🔥 🔥 🔥 Minou Clark Associate Editor of News and Emerging Platforms, The Huffington Post 
Gird your loins, people. This is not for the faint of heart. 
During the winter finale of “ Teen Wolf ,” things got hella steamy, and now life will never be the same. 
Stiles (Dylan O’Brien) and Lydia (Holland Roden) pretty much declared their love for each other with the best make-out scene in the history of make-out scenes. Seriously, just look at this chemistry. We’re definitely feeling the love. — JUST STYDIA (@clemstilinski) February 1, 2017 
Sorry, did you miss that? Let’s take another look. THEY KISS WITH SO MUCH PASSION. IM.... 😭😭😭 #TeenWolf #Stydia pic.twitter.com/92tjmVfaoZ 
It’s no surprise “Teen Wolf” fans had a collective meltdown over this romance overload. It’s just too much to handle. Rt if this was you when STYDIA happened #stydia #TeenWolf pic.twitter.com/tPAZrLOk7C
